title: Bank frauds up nearly 300% in last two years, digital frauds up 708%: RBI
description: Fraud cases in Indian banks surged to 36,075 in FY24 from 9,046 in FY22, a nearly 300% increase, while the amount involved dropped by 46.7% to Rs 13,930 crore. Most frauds occurred in digital payments, but the highest value frauds were in loan portfolios, with public banks contributing the most by value.
